text: An online casino is an online gambling system, i.e. all cash games in which winnings are decided by fate. The game is played through a browser (website) or an app (which can be downloaded from the website of the respective casino). Virtual chips or cryptocurrencies can be used. Depending on the country, only adults can use online casinos. In Poland, under an amendment to the Gambling Act, known as the Gambling Act, only legal online casino is Total Casino, which is operated by Totalizator Sportowy. == Other websites == * The history of the emergence of online casinos Category:Casinos
title: Online casino
